review_title: Cool NGO and great place to work!
pros: I've worked in a few different NGO's and this one is much better than average.  It has great people and a friendly and professional work atmosphere (kind of has a family feel to it).  Most of the staff are engaged and there are happy hours and other events every month or so. They listen to ideas from all levels and you can get good exposure to a variety of roles.
cons: Like other non-profits, it may not pay as well as a consulting firm, but the benefits are great.
